name: Pluton
description: A modern, self-hosted backup solution for secure, encrypted backups across local and cloud storage.

SECRET.description: Master encryption key for securing sensitive data (min 12 chars)

ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Encryption key for restic/rclone Snapshot encryption (min 12 chars)

notes: Default credentials are admin:password - CHANGE THESE IN PRODUCTION!
Access the Pluton UI at http://localhost:5173
Ensure you set strong secrets for SECRET, ENCRYPTION_KEY, and APIKEY.
